resources.string: I have read and agreed to《Shishi Tongyun User Authorization Agreement》《Shishi Tongyun User Service Agreement》 and《Privacy Policy of Shishi Tongyun》
Pls select date of the receipt
You have not placed an order yet, so surcharge can\'t be operated!
You have not placed an order yet, so surcharge can\'t be operated!
Pls select items needed to be returned to stock
Pls go to \"Settings\" to find the option of Protected Back Office App\" and add OnMobile to prevent the app from being removed at the back office!
Enter your phone number and check available coupons
"You can set rules of queuing and taking No.that will take effect in the queuing function of store\'s cash register and Online Store."
Network error, pls re-connect and try again!
Network error, pls re-connect and try again!
There is no warning item, the current operation won\'t empty the purchase cart!
There are no idle tables now
Ah there is no purchase order! !
Ah there is no return order! !
No buffet price is detected. Pls log in to configure at back office
Fail to clear with one click. Pls try again!
Pls select date of the receipt
Note: 1.the last 90 days ≤ selectable date ≤ intraday

"Pending amount.(revenue=sales revenue+pending amount)
Sell and return goods: sale means completed paid orders(including anti-settlement orders)；return means orders with full refund and partial refund（including returns form generated due to anti-settlement"

"Order source: collect completed orders according to order sources(including return and refund orders)
Sales amount: calculate amount through order Qty collected based on order source. If there is any refund, related sales amount should be deducted(calculation rule should be consistent with sales overview)"

"No. of diners: count No. of diners according to dine-in, take-out business. Only new anti-settlement orders\' PAX will be counted.
Average payment before discount: Average payment before discount=sales amount before discount/PAX
Customer number: customers in all orders(including void order, take-out order)"
"The reservation function is often used in store\'s cash registers. You can create usage rules for reservations here, which applys to cash registers as well as Online Store."
"Your Online Store has been expired. This miniprogram can\'t be used now. If you renew your subscription now , you\'ll get benefits."
"Your Online Store is about to expire after %s days. If you renew your subscription now , you\'ll get benefits."
Build an Online Store. Customers can scan code on WeChat, Alipay to address offline queuing problems. Through social communication, attract customers in all directions.
A total of %1$d table codes are saved
3rd step: apply for making table sticker
Ask the customer to scan the payment code and pay
The time period 00: 00-00: 00 represents the whole day and 5 groups of periods at most can be set for accepting orders. The No. of orders can be accepted is 1-5000.
Registered into the warehouse by scanning code
Pls touch box\'s lines to clip the image
